ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND ( OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'AVO_Agricultural_Water_Withdrawal_Application', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Application_to_Modify_or_Transfer_an_Agricultural_Water_Withdrawal_Permit' ), ISPICKVAL(AVO_Water_Conservation_Plan__c, 'Golf Course and Turf Systems') , (!AVO_Other_Golf_And_Turf__c)
)
